panels.description: Searchable and filterable logs from Quickwit. Query syntax: service_name:semantic-explorer AND severity_text:ERROR
panels.title: 📋 Searchable Logs Explorer

panels.description: Searchable traces from Quickwit. Query spans and trace data. Query syntax: service_name:semantic-explorer
panels.title: 🔎 Searchable Traces Explorer

panels.description: Note: Live log streaming requires a Loki-compatible datasource. Quickwit stores logs in OpenTelemetry format. View logs directly in Quickwit UI at http://localhost:7280 or query the otel-logs-v0_7 index via Elasticsearch API.
panels.title: 📋 Log Ingestion Rate by Service & Severity
